1.content: Does josh get shrunken or transfomed?
1.title: First of all..

121.content: By whom do you get transformed?
121.title: The burkins!

1212.content:
It was another day for josh to get some money. Today he is going to look for the children of the burkins. They lately call him alot because the husband has worries to leave his kids alone because of his crazy ex wife. Josh never met her so he isnt that worried about it. Josh went out early. He was told to be there early, that was the wish of mister burkins. He arrived at the house and knocked. Mr. Burkins opened the door "thank god josh your here. Here is the money and i will be back at 5. Keep them occupied and busy or else they cant sleep. Byebye!" He said as he entered his car. Josh went inside as he sat down onto the couch. It was always easy to keep them busy. Nick always went outside and played around for as mike loved to be inside and watch movies.

Suddenly a dull object hit him from behind and he passed out. He woke up by a lpud voice "finally...im gonna be with my kids again..all this witchcraft worked." Josh couldnt believe his eyes. He saw himself as he held him in his hand. "Now i only need to get rid of the real one...what should i turn him into.."
1212.title: By the ex wife

12121.content:
"Oh i know a pair of socks!" Josh heart sank as his vision got blurry and his body stretched out.
"Great all done now whos gonna get it..."
12121.title: A pair of socks

122.content:
It was a normal day for josh. He was in the house of the miranies to babysit lina mina and nina. It was nice and quite at the moment because the kids werent at home. Lina was by a friend of there mother, mina and nina played outside the room. Josh decides to make their rooms whilst theyre gone. It was one of the task the mother told him to do.

Josh went to clean...
122.title: The miranies

info.brief_description: Josh was watching over the children of a family but then he transformed/shrunk
info.description:
Josh was a 16 year old boy who is a baby sitting for some families to get some cash, but this time he has a bad feeling..

The families:

The burkins:
A nice family with 2 boys nick(14year old) and mike(13 year old)

The miranies:
a chinese family with 3 girls. Lina (9 years old) mina (12 years old) and nina( 16 years old)


The whistletons:
The parents were nice but theyre two teenies stacy( 17 years old) and tommy (18 years old) are mean annoying brats
